data.message: Very frustrated with lack of support and closed tickets that are left unresolved

replies.message: This is the only outlet I could find that seems to get a real reply from anyone so hoping for the best. I am trying to make a location for my house, and i get an error message telling me I am using invalid capitalization. Then it asks if I'd like to use (INSERT THE EXACT NAME I WROTE) instead? When I click "OK",...it just repeats the process.
We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Benjamin. Can you please give us more detail here http://bit.ly/2dPV9Tg? -Joe
Thanks Joe! I have tried that but the issue isn't present there at all! What's happening is I can't create a location because "invalid capitalization"
Hi Benjamin. If something's not working, or you think there's a bug, you can report it to us by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2dQpOzv. -Joe

TRUMP jumped past 12 million likes on facebook last night. Coincidence that facebook no longer posts number of likes he has? No, an entirely planned move so we can't see the many ppl who were moved by the third debate. If we weren't winning, facebook would NOT have made this move. We are trump-nation! And TRUMP WILL WIN IF WE STICK TOGETHER AND VOTE! LET'S ROLL!

I've reported a few accounts lately for using blatant racially provocative terms, yet Facebook continues to inform me that racial slurs are not a violation of their Community Standards.  Does racial slurs not constitute "hate speech"?
